oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Paul Thorn's Temple Fireworks Revival - 2018-10-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Paul Thorn and the Paul Thorn band of the Mission Temple Fireworks Revival from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 7, 2018. Guest include Bonnie Bishop and The Five Blind Boy of Alabama.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Paul Thorn; Bonnie Bishop; The Five Blind Boys of Alabama;

(11:37) Opening comments from Paul Thorn / (12:20) Performs I Am A Poor Wayfaring Stranger (Bonnie Bishop-vocal) (18:37) Bonnie introduces the next song / (18:57) Performs Done Died (Bonnie
